verses.verse: My <S%G80>brethren,<s%> do not <S%G2192>hold<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> in our <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> with [an attitude of] <S%G4382>personal<s%> <S%G4382>favoritism.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1525>comes<s%> into your <S%G4864>assembly<s%> with a <S%G5554>gold<s%> <S%G5554>ring<s%> and dressed in <S%G2986>fine<s%> <S%G2066>clothes,<s%> and there <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1525>comes<s%> in a <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G4434>man<s%> in <S%G4508>dirty<s%> <S%G2066>clothes,<s%>

and you <S%G1914>pay<s%> <S%G1914>special<s%> <S%G1914>attention<s%> to the one who is <S%G5409>wearing<s%> the <S%G2986>fine<s%> <S%G2066>clothes,<s%> and <S%G3004>say,<s%> "You <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in a <S%G2573>good<s%> place," and you <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G4434>man,<s%> "You <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1563>over<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G2521>down<s%> by my <S%G5286>footstool,<s%>"
have you not <S%G1252>made<s%> <S%G1252>distinctions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2923>judges<s%> with <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>motives<s%>?

<S%G191>Listen,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren:<s%> did not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>choose<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> [to be] <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> Him?

But you have <S%G818>dishonored<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G4434>man.<s%> Is it not the <S%G4145>rich<s%> who <S%G2616>oppress<s%> you and <S%G846>personally<s%> <S%G1670>drag<s%> you into <S%G2922>court<s%>?
Do they not <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> the <S%G2570>fair<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> by which you have been <S%G1941>called<s%>?

<S%G1487>If,<s%> <S%G3305>however,<s%> you are <S%G5055>fulfilling<s%> the <S%G937>royal<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself,<s%>" you are <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G4380>show<s%> <S%G4380>partiality,<s%> you are <S%G2038>committing<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> [and] are <S%G1651>convicted<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> as <S%G3848>transgressors.<s%>

For <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> and <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4417>stumbles<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> [point,] he has <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For He who <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%>" <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do not <S%G5407>commit<s%> <S%G5407>murder.<s%>" <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> but do <S%G5407>commit<s%> <S%G5407>murder,<s%> you have <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>act,<s%> as those who are to be <S%G2919>judged<s%> by [the] <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

For <S%G2920>judgment<s%> [will be] <S%G7016>merciless<s%> to one who has <S%G4160>shown<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy;<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2620>triumphs<s%> <S%G2620>over<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3786>use<s%> is it, my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> but he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>? <S%G1410>Can<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> him?
<S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%> is <S%G1131>without<s%> <S%G1131>clothing<s%> and in <S%G3007>need<s%> of <S%G2184>daily<s%> <S%G5160>food,<s%>

and <S%G5100>one<s%> of you <S%G3004>says<s%> to them, <S%G5217>"Go<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> be <S%G2328>warmed<s%> and be <S%G5526>filled,<s%>" and <S%G1161>yet<s%> you do not <S%G1325>give<s%> them <S%G2006>what<s%> is <S%G2006>necessary<s%> for [their] <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3786>use<s%> is that?
<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> is <S%G3498>dead,<s%> [being] by <S%G1438>itself.<s%>

But <S%G5100>someone<s%> may [well] <S%G3004>say,<s%> "You <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2041>works;<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> me your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G2041>works,<s%> and I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you my <S%G4102>faith<s%> by my <S%G2041>works.<s%>"
You <S%G4100>believe<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1520>one.<s%> You <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> and <S%G5425>shudder.<s%>
But are you <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1097>recognize,<s%> you <S%G2756>foolish<s%> <S%G444>fellow,<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> is <S%G692>useless<s%>?
Was not <S%G11>Abraham<s%> our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> when he <S%G399>offered<s%> up <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> his <S%G5207>son<s%> on the <S%G2379>altar<s%>?

You <S%G991>see<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> was <S%G4903>working<s%> with his <S%G2041>works,<s%> and as a <S%G1537>result<s%> of the <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> was <S%G5048>perfected;<s%>

and the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which <S%G3004>says,<s%> "And <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to him as <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%>" and he was <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
You <S%G3708>see<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> and not by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

And in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> was not <S%G4460>Rahab<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> when she <S%G5264>received<s%> the <S%G32>messengers<s%> and <S%G1544>sent<s%> them out by <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>?

For <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> [the] <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> is <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
